body.name: YOUFI Extra Thick Large Seat Cushion -19 X 17.5 X 4 Inch Gel Memory Foam Cushion with Carry Handle Non Slip Bottom - Pain Relief Coccyx Cushion for Wheelchair Office Chair (Black (1PACK))
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 23 hrs 36 mins
features: SIZE 19" x 17.5" x 4" Large Super Thick Gel & Memory Foam Seat Cushion: Pressure is spread over a larger area, giving you a more comfortable fit. Hard and even traditionally padded seating surfaces create pressure on your tailbone causing Pain, Poor posture, Improper spine alignment, Decreased blood circulation, Pinched nerves & Orthopedic problems. OUR CUSHIONS CAN HELP!

PAIN RELIEF for Back, Legs, Hips, and Sciatica: Designed to provide comfort by alleviating pressure on the lower back, waist, hips, and thighs. Our office chair cushion also helps relieve sciatica symptoms, allowing you to power through your day. Its curve design minimizes the pressure that other chair pillows can cause to improve blood circulation.4 INCH memory foam provid adequate support and comfort,suitable for people who is overweight and need seat booster.

NON SKID BOTTOM AND CARRY HANDLE - make it portable and easy to transport . Great for: Office Chair, Computer Desk, Kitchen, Dining room, Living room, Patio, Couch, Recliner. Take it with you to Sporting Events to use on Benches and Bleachers. Great for Car, Truck, Train & Airplane Travel, Classrooms. Place it on the floor for Yoga, Meditation or as a Kneeling Pad Cushion for Tasks.

Breathable mesh cloth cover and gel cushion layer: The zippered removable, black MESH COVER is MACHINE WASHABLE for easy cleaning.The combination of cover and gel cushion provides SUPERIOR AIR CIRCULATION AND BREATHABILITY to KEEP YOU BUTT COOL while you sit. Durable, stands up to tough everyday use.

POLYMER MEMORY FOAM inner core: Different from other cushion which made up of two type of sponge, the 4INCH thick full memory foam core used in YOUFI cushions provides better comfort and support without flattening.If you are troubled by hemorrhoids,overweight or sciatica, choose this extra-thick cushion,the best cushion for long sitting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The YOUFI extra-large seat cushion is constructed of 2 layer system -- gel and memory foam. This unique design combines the two key elements you are looking for: COMFORT and DURABILITY. The extra size enables it to provide bigger coverage to dissipate pressure more effectively while conforming to body contours. It is firm enough to give you good support but not to the point of being "too hard" to undermine its use as a cushion. It can be used on almost any seating surface.. It is designed to help relieve back pain, numb buttocks, and other discomfort associated with prolonged sitting. ​ This newly released and improved version includes a high quality cover coated with an ANTI-SLIP layer at the bottom of the cushion to prevent it from sliding and BUILT IN HANDLE for easy carry and transport anywhere you go to be sure you can sit comfortably.

How to provide a extremely comfortable cushion experience? Our cushion measures 19” wide by 17.5” deep and is 4 “ thick. ​Made of our 2 Layer-- filled with high-quality memory foam and comes with a gel layer. While ensuring the best support of the memory foam, the gel provides better cooling and stress relief functions. It remains uniform in density and conforms to your individual shape to Relieve Pressure Points and help Increase Blood Flow while Maintaining Support and Comfort time after time.

ONLY THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS ARE USED FOR SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE Durable Mesh Cover The durable mesh cover that provides Superior Air Circulation to prevent sweating and keep you cool, while easily standing up to tough everyday use. Removable and Machine Washable. The cover is Removable and Machine Washable. Just unzip and remove the cover. Wash in cold and air dry. Zipper protection design can prevent scratching the chair. Non Skid Bottom The Non Skid Bottom keeps the cushion in place on slippery seating surfaces. And the handle can easily lift the seat cushion, making it more portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to elevate myself while sitting in my reclines. Works well for purpose bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS CUSHION IS EXPENSIVE, BUT BOY DOES IT WORK!
reviews.reviewText: If you are very overweight often these kind of cushions cannot withstand the impact of daily use and flatten out after a few months. Not this one. Yes, it is a little hard, but without that hardness the cushion would just flatten out like everything else I have brought. This one does the job and keep on bouncing back and supporting me. If you are regular weight, then any cushion will do. This support cushion I would say is really for overweight people like myself who crush them into the nothingness or for people who enjoy extra firm support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Really Helps!!
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is well made and seems to be of good quality. I considered buying a cushion that is self-lifting but all the reviews say those cushions are hard and I felt they would not be comfortable to sit on for hours. Then I saw this gel cushion which has memory foam which would be softer for sitting, with a handle so I could take in the car - another plus as I am only 4’10” and seat belts don’t fit where they are supposed to across my chest. This cushion will help raise me to the proper height for the seatbelt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice soft cushion
reviews.reviewText: This cushion works great on my recliner and wheelchair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too soft to be a firm cushion
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered this before, and it was perfect: high density, firm, washable cover, exactly as described. This time however, the exact same item is of the same excellent quality, but the firmness is lacking. It’s gives about 2” when I sit and I only weigh 100 lbs. the previous one hardly gave in at all, but was still comfortable. But it is an excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft while supportive, but Huge
reviews.reviewText: Nice cushion seems even bigger than it really measures to be. It makes it hard to keep it on a chair that doesn't have arms. It will stick out over the edges many dining room chairs for example, and get knocked off when pets or people brush against it. It is very comfortable and really helps with low back pain. The only thing that might make it even better is if it had a tailbone cut out, but that's a different product. It helped my mother-in-law's back pain right away, and even raises her up in the chair a little bit, so she can reach better when we play cards. It makes a hard chair far more comfortable for longer periods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is excellent. I will be having hip replacement very soon. Sitting is the best position at this point. But a regular chair or even a recliner doesn't provide sufficient support and comfort. This cushion does. I tried several, but this one is the only one providing comfort. It seems very heavy and really thick (4 inches) and once you sit down it seems really high, but as soon as you sit on it you it feels as if you are melting, while it slowly encapsulating your buttocks and hip in soft but yet firm comfort. The cushion supports and relieves much of the pain. In addition, it cools while sitting on it. Excellent, highly recommended. Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Too thick. Too high. But using it anyway
Comfortable, good quality but prices is bit too high
